nodes.text: The Maximum Security Tech Center was a maintenance and technology facility in the Prison Tech Station in the Maximum Security Section, a sector of the Belsavis prison facility on the planet Belsavis. During the reconstituted Sith Empire's invasion of Belsavis during the Galactic War, a bounty hunter searching for Zale Barrows brought the remains of Barrows' astromech droid M3-OB to the tech center, where the Houk Skadge and the hunter forced some technicians to repair the droid.
The Maximum Security Tech Center is a class-restricted area on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where the Bounty Hunter class mission "Mnemonia" occurs.
